long_description: This REI dog food bowl keeps your furry friend's kibbles contained and easy to access on long outings. It compresses down for storage. Reflective printing increases visibility at night to help prevent accidental tip overs. Internal stiffener gives the bowl opening a rigid form for even the biggest mouths to get in. 100% post-consumer recycled PET body fabric withstands wear and tear. Waterproof, coated nylon lining with seamless construction keeps wet food from soaking through. Drawstring closure keeps food from spilling out of bowl during transport and folds over sides when it's feeding time. Molded bottom panel and tapered shape keeps bowl from tipping over easily; elastic band on bottom secures empty bowl when it's folded flat.
short_description: This REI dog food bowl keeps your furry friend's kibbles contained and easy to access on long outings. It compresses down for storage.
